By clicking Create Account you agree to Recognizes
Change the data in provide form

WasteWise is an app designed to help people identify waste types and offer creative recycling ideas. Using image classification, we aim to support environmental sustainability. Developed by a team passionate about protecting the environment, this app is a small tool for making a big difference.
We value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information.
Data Collected: Uploaded images, names, and email addresses.
Purpose: To provide recycling recommendations and improve user experience.

Data Protection: Your data is securely stored and will not be shared without your consent, except with third-party services that support this app (e.g., analytics services). You have the right to request the deletion of your data at any time by contacting us.
By using this app, you agree to the following terms:
1. Use this app for lawful purposes only.
2. Do not misuse the services for illegal activities or violate the rights of others.
3. Understand that the app developers are not responsible for any decisions made based on the app’s recommendations.
Discover the power of recycling and unleash your creativity. Start classifying waste and turn it into amazing crafts. Together, we make the world cleaner and greener!
Snap a photo of the waste to identify its type and discover creative craft ideas!

Welcome to WasteWise! 

Our mission is to enhance recycling awareness and empower individuals to take meaningful steps toward a sustainable future. WasteWise helps you classify waste using advanced technology, discover creative reuse ideas, and track your recycling habits. 

Whether you’re a beginner or an eco-conscious enthusiast, our app provides tools to make recycling simple, fun, and impactful. Join us in creating a cleaner, greener world!

By using WasteWise, you agree to the following terms:

1. Responsible Use: Use the app for personal or educational purposes related to waste classification and recycling.
2. Accurate Information: Ensure that any data or images you provide are accurate and comply with applicable laws.
3. Content Ownership: Respect intellectual property rights. Content provided by WasteWise is for your personal use and may not be redistributed without permission.
4. Prohibited Actions: Avoid misuse of the app, such as uploading inappropriate content or using the app for commercial purposes without approval.

Non-compliance with these terms may result in account restrictions or termination. By continuing, you agree to these terms.

At WasteWise, your privacy is our priority. We collect and use your data to improve the app's performance, personalize your experience, and enhance waste classification accuracy.

What We Collect:
- Basic user information (e.g., email, username).
- Images you upload for waste classification.
- App usage statistics to improve features.

How We Use It:
- To provide accurate waste classification results.
- To personalize app features and recommendations.
- To maintain and secure your account.

We do not sell your data to third parties. Any shared information will always be anonymized and used responsibly. For detailed policies, visit our website or contact support.
